remarks: Applying an operation restricted to the range of the functions does not change the function operation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Feb-2018.)
statement:
ofresid.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
ofresid.2 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> B ) $.
ofresid.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofresid $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = ( F oF ( R |` ( B X. B ) ) G ) ) $.
